body: I added a few lines of new Python codes to a Honeybee component by double click the component and revised the code in the Grasshopper Python Script Editor interface. However, these codes were gone when I updated the Honeybee components. I understand that all LB+HB components are GhPython component. So, which of the following lines of standard code in a LB+HB component can be removed to prevent it from been updated while still maintain the ability to call LB+HB core libraries? Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SLnPUVCMGK47fS*Ci8kgAjXRPWwQB24FTIJbuOrrDff44OQ3-7FncjwgF0d0WFqVJnQWBP3X9V9UfHqbwlcFWyW4XcteKwQG/Image8.png)
topic: how to prevent a revised ladybug or honeybee component from been updated?
